deals.pitchHtml:
BlueAnt Embrace Stereo Headphones with Mic and Apple Remote

These stereo headphones cradle ears within leather-cushioned ear pads and sing them to sleep with rich sounds emitted from 40mm drivers. Their lightweight folding design makes them easily adjustable, and their gleaming aluminum hardware holds up well under inspection from judges at headphone pageants. Listeners can effortlessly switch tracks or crank up the volume using an included Apple remote. A carrying case gives users enough space to temporarily stow away the headphones, remote, and included adapter cable.

  • Deep sound from 40mm drivers
  • Leather-cushioned foam ear pads fit comfortably
  • Apple remote easily changes tracks, volume, or shape of your ears
  • Aluminum hardware
  • Lightweight, folding design
  • Includes carrying case and OMTP adapter cable

deals.pitchHtml:
After purchasing this deal, you will need to visit the website listed on your Groupon voucher to complete redemption. See voucher for more information.

Collage.com Custom Collage Poster

Collage.com's design tool organizes up to 500 personal images into a custom collage, printed in crisp detail atop high-quality poster paper. Each collage arranges photos into more than 150 shapes, ranging from the outline of a bride and groom for a collection of wedding pictures or a majestic tree to encase memories of lumberjack camp. The secure site's intuitive uploading tool organizes images into almost-finished products that customers can rearrange before the staff prints the personalized poster.

  • 16”x20” poster displays 8–160 images
  • 20”x30” poster displays 15–300 images
  • 24”x36” poster displays 20–500 images
  • Ideal for wedding photos, family photos, or dental x-rays
  • 150+ collage-template shapes, such as rectangles, bride and groom, or tree
  • Photo-quality printing
  • Can upload image files or from Facebook albums
  • Upload images to secure site, which generates a custom collage

How to get your goods: after purchasing this deal, pull up your Groupon with our mobile app or by going to My Groupons (or to My Gifts if you are giving this as a gift*) and clicking the view voucher link. Then, follow the instructions on your voucher.

For questions pertaining to this deal, please visit the deal Q&A on this page. For post-purchase inquiries, please see your voucher for customer service contact information.

View the Groupon Goods FAQ for additional information.

*Once the recipient claims your gift, you will no longer be able to print the Groupon.

deals.pitchHtml:
L'Homme Libre by Yves Saint Laurent Eau de Toilette for Men

  • Men's fragrance with fresh-spicy and soft-spicy notes
  • Anytime wear
  • Top notes of star anise, basil, violet leaf, and bergamot
  • Heart notes of nutmeg and pink pepper
  • Base notes of vetiver and patchouli
  • Introduced in 2006
  • 1.3 or 2.0 fl. oz. spray bottle
  • Smooth, round glass bottle with smoky bottom and broad, cleanly faceted top

About Yves Saint Laurent

In 1957, legendary designer Christian Dior calmly passed the reins of his eponymous fashion house to a remarkably young, 21-year-old Yves Saint Laurent. This single act kick-started the boy wonder’s enduring fashion legacy, and he launched his own line in 1962. During the decades that followed, his fame would skyrocket, propelled by groundbreaking, often controversial, designs that turned celebrities, fashion lovers, and fellow designers Miuccia Prada and Giorgio Armani into devout fans. Of his lasting influence, designer Christian Lacroix once quipped, "He's got the form of Chanel with the opulence of Dior and the wit of Schiaparelli."

Saint Laurent was both lauded and slandered for this ingenuity and his often-paradoxical themes. Culling influence from cultural movements, the Beats, and political protests unfolding around the world during the ‘60s and ‘70s, Saint Laurent upset old-world fashion ideals with nearly every collection. He ruffled the feathers of the fashion elite by blending blue-collar garments such as peasant blouses and leather jackets with his couture works. He also outfitted women in tuxedoes and fedoras before it was common. His long-time partner, Pierre Berge, famously summed up Saint Laurent's legacy in one turn-of-phrase: “Chanel gave women freedom. Yves Saint Laurent gave them power.”

Houdini 2-in-1 Stylus and Gravity Pen

Free your fat fingers from touchscreen miscues in favor of this Houdini 2-in-1 tool. On one end of the multifunctional writing utensil is a highly sensitive stylus designed for tablets and mobile handsets. When traditional note taking is in order, invert the Houdini and the pen automatically self-engages so you can start writing quickly without having to look for a pen.

  • 2-in-1 stylus and pen combo
  • Sensitive and accurate on touchscreens
  • Pen automatically self-engages when turned over to write
  • Pen automatically retracts when stylus is in use
  • Dimensions: 5” (L) x 0.5” (W) x 0.5” (H)

deals.pitchHtml:
The Deal

  • MOTA Samsung S3 Premium Covering Extended Battery (2200 mAh) in soft black or soft white
  • MOTA Samsung S4 Premium Covering Extended Battery (2600 mAh) in soft black or soft white

Click here to see an image of each option.

MOTA Samsung Extended-Battery Smartphone Cases

Extended-battery cases prolong your ability to use your smartphone when its battery dies away from charging sources. MOTA’s cases include built-in protection to keep them from overcharging, and each case contains quality battery cells to meet high safety and performance standards. In addition, the cases shield phones from the wear and tear of everyday use and occasional skirmishes with roving bands of orcs.

  • Protects smartphones
  • Capacity: 2600 mAh (S4), 2200 mAh (S3)
  • Input: 5V/1.0A (max)
  • Output: 5. ± .25V/1A
  • Weight: 3.1 oz. (S4), 2.1 oz. (S3)
  • Dimensions:
    • S4: 5.75” (L) x 0.6” (W) x 2.75” (H)
    • S3: 7.3" (L) x 0.8" (W) x 4.7" (H)
  • 1-year warranty from MOTA
  • Condition: new

In the box: Phone case, power pack, USB power cable, user manual, and screen protector

deals.pitchHtml:
Mederma Stretch Marks Therapy Cream

Skincare experts blended this formula to help diminish the appearance of stretch marks. The cream contains three primary ingredients—cepalin, a proprietary botanical extract; hyaluronic acid; and centella asiatica extract—that may fade the color of stretch marks over time. They might also improve skin texture and softness, thereby further lessening stretch marks' appearance. Simply apply the cream over target areas like a lotion, massaging it in with a circular motion or by writing your name in gothic letters.

  • Cepalin—a proprietary botanical extract—blended with hyaluronic acid and centella asiatica extract
  • May diminish the coloration of stretch marks over time
  • May improve skin texture and softness for faster rides down water slides
  • Spot apply like a lotion
  • Weight: 5.29 oz.
  • Click here for a full list of ingredients.

To complete your Goods order, simply purchase this Groupon and provide your name and shipping address.

Please check the Fine Print for this deal’s estimated delivery timeframe. We work with thousands of brands to deliver the amazing selection you see on Groupon Goods, and this shipping window ensures we have enough time to coordinate with our suppliers to get you the products you love.

deals.pitchHtml:
Resort on Former Plantation Close to Historic District

“Caesar had his Brutus, Charles his Cromwell, and George III may profit by their examples." These fighting words were uttered by Patrick Henry over cries of “treason” as he denounced British tyranny during a Virginia assembly in 1765. Instead of being arrested, however, he went on to catalyze the American Revolution. You can still listen to Patrick Henry debate colonial rights today—sort of—at Williamsburg’s reconstructed brick capitol building. This Patrick Henry is an actor, of course, one of several appearing in daily historical reenactments in the historic district, where visitors can see sophisticated representations of daily life in the colony and in pre-colonial Native American tribes.

About 5 miles west you'll find Greensprings Vacation Resort on the grounds of a former plantation. It's a good home base for exploring the area’s historic attractions, but there's also plenty to do onsite. You can take advantage of floodlighted tennis courts and indoor and outdoor pools. Most guest rooms have their own electric fireplaces and private jetted tubs.

The resort sits right next door to the Williamsburg National Golf Club, which has a Jack Nicklaus–designed course hailed by Golf Digest as one of the 10 best courses you can play in Virginia.

Highlights of Williamsburg, Virginia

  • Revolutionary history: American forces gathered here in 1781 to march to Yorktown for the final British defeat.
  • Living museum where fifers march in Revolutionary War regalia and costumed actors portray everyday colonists
  • Well-preserved architecture: 88 original 18th-century structures stand within the town, including the opulent Governor’s Palace, built in 1722 to house the British governor
  • Historic specialty boutiques along Merchants Square sell everything from whimsical toys to hand-cooked Virginia peanuts.
  • Original folk art is on display at several galleries and exhibits throughout the city.

Love to travel? Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for travel tips, inspiration, and photos from around the world.

deals.pitchHtml:
Adolfo Men's Murphy Dress Shoes

These faux-leather dress shoes pair perfectly with suits and chinos for 9-to-5 grinds or special nights out. They come in two designs: lace-up for a traditional look or slip-on for easy, effortless style. Both versions prize comfort with a genuine leather sock and lining, along with a cushioned insole that cradles feet. The bottoms are made with slip-resistant rubber that prevents accidental bouts of breakdancing on freshly waxed floors.

  • Faux-leather dress shoes for work or play
  • Traditional lace-up or slip-on style
  • Slip-on style has silver-tone metal accents
  • Genuine leather sock and lining
  • Cushioned insole for added comfort
  • Semi-flexible rubber outsole
  • Slip-resistant traction on bottom
  • Fits true to size

About Adolfo

Known to the world simply as Adolfo, fashion designer Adolfo Sardina cut his chops as an apprentice to the legendary Balenciaga before branching out on his own. He chose not to follow closely in the footsteps of the courterier, who tended to create unique, extravagant pieces. “A person can look put together without appearing too rigid or extravagant,” Adolfo once said, adding, “We must all maintain the freedom to show off individuality.” In his pursuit of wearable yet distinctive clothing and accessories, Sardina racked up two Coty Awards and a third nomination as he grew his business from hats to men’s and women’s ready-to-wear apparel. Today, the company emphasizes classic styling and Sardina’s same wearable design aesthetic, creating timeless looks for both men and women.

deals.pitchHtml:
Smoking hookah together is a sign of camaraderie, like buying your friend a birthday present or helping them chew their gum. Show just how close you are with this Groupon.

Choose Between Two Options

  • $15 for $30 worth of Moroccan food, drinks, and hookah
  • $20 for $40 worth of Moroccan food, drinks, and hookah plus a complimentary dessert

Kiosk's menu consists of Moroccan staples such as roasted-eggplant puree with toasted pita bread ($6). Main courses feature entrees such as chicken kabobs with hummus and saffron rice ($14), or kofta tajine's minced lamb and beef with moroccan herb sauce ($14). Between meals, guests can puff on a hookah with or without fresh fruit ($20+) or sip on cocktails from the bar ($9).

deals.highlightsHtml: Moroccan café pairs authentic cuisine such as baba ganoush and kebabs with hookah and live music

says.emailContentHtml: What are some bold choices that could transform your entire life?
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Bold Choices
says.websiteContentHtml:
Einstein once said, "A life half-lived will only experience a half-life," an inspirational quote inspired by his bold addiction to radioactive isotopes. What are some bold choices that could transform your life?

  • Try adding some hot sauce to your food instead of just plain old sauce.
  • Play hooky, or its equally dangerous cousin, hockey.
  • Stand up to your neighborhood bully. If he kills you, the joke’s on him—murder is still illegal in your state!
  • If your name is Ben Kobold, change your name to Ben So-bold.
  • Quit your day job! This will free up time for you to pursue your real dreams: steady employment and financial security.

deals.pitchHtml:
Bling Dental Shazzam Tsunami Hydroflosser

Pulses of water from this handheld hydroflosser sweep between teeth to gently remove food particles and buildup. The rechargeable device helps combat plaque and gingivitis-causing bacteria by targeting places that floss struggles to reach, including between bridgework, braces, and third rows of teeth.

  • Gentle pulses of water clean between teeth, braces, and crowns
  • Helps fight plaque and gingivitis-causing buildup from eating and swearing
  • Rechargeable
  • Dimensions: 12”x5.5”x5”
  • Weight: 2 pounds

deals.pitchHtml:
Six-Pack of Tart Collections Women's Seamless Thongs or Boy Shorts

  • Seamless laser-cut design
  • Invisible under clothing
  • Assorted neutral colors, bright colors, and prints
  • 85% nylon, 15% spandex
  • Machine washable
  • Sizing chart

About Tart Collections

In 2004, husband-and-wife team Jamie and Dana Finegold brought “West-coast cool with a dose of poolside glamour” to the fashion world. Their laid-back inspiration is evident in the ability of each article of their clothing to easily transition from day to night. Their clothing is also designed to flatter a woman’s natural curves through elegant draping and thoughtful construction. Because of the care put into every piece, celebrities including Heidi Klum, Katy Perry, and Alessandra Ambrosio are oft photographed in their dresses, fitted jackets, and modern knitwear. The clothing line has been featured in fashion publications the world over, and has caught the attention of the powerful fashion editors at Harper’s Bazaar and Marie Claire.

deals.pitchHtml:
Progressive International Collapsible Salad Spinner

Rinse, dry, and serve leafy greens with this all-in-one salad spinner. Designed with a nested colander, any trace pesticides slip harmlessly down the drain with a rinse. To keep salads crisp, use the spinner's pull-string to dry the lettuce by harnessing the power of centrifugal force. Once meals have been enjoyed, the dishwasher-safe container can collapse to approximately half its original height and be stored away in cabinets.

  • Salad spinner for cleaning and drying greens
  • Space-saving collapsible design
  • Reduces to half of its full height
  • Inner colander
  • Outer bowl can double as a serving dish or an ill-fitting helmet
  • Non-skid ring on base
  • Level surface makes it easier to stack in cabinets
  • Dishwasher-safe
  • 4-quart capacity
  • Dimensions: 10" (round) x 3"

deals.pitchHtml:
Marc New York Women's Workout Pants

Most apparel companies have discovered the link between looking and feeling good, but Marc New York's designers have upped the ante with their performance wear. These sleek fleece pants help wearers look their best even during workouts, and wearers will be just as stylish while running errands afterwards. The open-bottom drawstring pants are easy to wear and don't restrict movement no matter the exercise. The sweatpants are also designed for workouts, but they're just as likely to attract attention on the street because their slouchy silhouette and tapered ankles are inspired by designer sweatpants from the likes of Alexander Wang and others.

In 1981, an expertly tailored lambskin bomber jacket with soft fur lining cemented Andrew Marc as an icon in the world of high fashion. His all-American design eventually snowballed to include more men's and women's outerwear, as well as a line of soft leather goods, dresses, and handbags. The designer maintains that "luxury materials, innovative engineering, and exclusive artisan details" are the cornerstone of his brand, whose looks frequently grace the glossy pages of People StyleWatch, Elle, and Harper's Bazaar. His label expanded into three divisions, including Marc New York and Marc Moto, a recent addition characterized by a rebellious aesthetic and penchant for missing curfew.

The Details

Click here to view a sizing chart.

#####Drawstring Fleece Pants

  • Open-bottom pants
  • Drawstring waist
  • Thermal side stripe
  • 60% cotton; 40% distressed fleece

Slouchy Fleece Pants
  • On-trend sweatpants
  • Tapered style
  • Thermal pockets
  • 60% cotton; 40% distressed fleece

deals.pitchHtml:
Netgear NeoTV Streaming Player and AC Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router

Netgear's NeoTV streams thousands of television shows and movies to your TV from preloaded apps such as Netflix, YouTube, and Hulu Plus. With login information and the answers to three riddles, these apps instantly stream content in up to 1080p HD resolution with 5.1 surround sound.

The bundle also includes a Netgear WiFi router, which offers faster speeds up to 300+867 Mbps. 802.11ac technology offers a better range so you can move freely with your mobile devices and still be connected. Simultaneous dual-band technology reduces interference between devices so your TV can stream content from the NeoTV without being disturbed by someone playing online video games with HD resolution in the next room.

Netgear NeoTV Streaming Player (NTV300-100NAS)
  • Product number: NTV300-100NAS
  • Stream television shows and movies
  • WiFi or Ethernet connection
  • Supports up to 1080p HD resolution
  • Supports 5.1 surround sound so you can hear actors' tummies growl
  • HDMI output
  • iOS and Android remote control app download available
  • Requires a broadband Internet connection, device with an Internet browser for channel activation, and TV with HDMI input and cable
  • Full specifications
  • Condition: new
  • One-year warranty from Netgear

Netgear Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router (R6200-100PAS)
  • Next generation 802.11ac WiFi
  • Speeds up to 300+867 Mbps
  • Better mobility for WiFi devices
  • Gigabit wired for HD gaming and video
  • Simultaneous dual-band connection reduces interference
  • Easy setup

  • Full specifications
  • Condition: new

At-home chefs easily whip up homemade yogurt with Dash's convenient countertop appliance. deals.pitchHtml:
Burgers and beers are the perfect way to relax after a long day, right up there with attending happy hour and slipping into a pair of clean, warm socks. Do your soul some good with this Groupon.

Choose Between Two Options

  • $18.99 for two draft beers and two specialty burgers (a $39 value)
  • $36.99 for four draft beers and four specialty burgers (a $78 value)
  • See the drink and food menus.
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person, may buy 1 additional as gift. Limit 1 per table. Valid only for option purchased. Dine-in only. Not valid for happy hour specials or any other specials. Not valid on 12/31/13. Alcohol is not discounted more than 50%. Merchant is solely responsible for all sales and delivery of alcohol. Must provide 21+ ID to receive alcoholic beverages.
deals.highlightsHtml: Specialty burgers such as Cajun variety paired with draft beers
